name: European Academy of Specialized Studies
legal: registered in England and Wales No. 12288586
goal: The Academy aims to pay attention to specialized academic and professional studies and to various levels of education to build a human resource with high efficiency and effectiveness.( n)The Academy derives its authority from the quality of its members, who represent the full spectrum of scientific and scholarly endeavor and are selected on the basis of their achievements.( n)the Academy promotes quality in science and scholarship and strives to ensure that scholars and scientists contribute to cultural, social and economic progress. As a research organisation, the Academy is It promotes innovation and knowledge valorisation with university research groups.( n)Seeking to( n)- Development of vocational higher education at the European, Global level( n)- Applying the principles of continuing professional education( n)- To achieve effective communication between the citizens of the Union countries and the outside world within the field of competence( n)- Building joint cooperation relations between institutions in the field of interest and competence.
interests: Education and training, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
- Application of the European Qualification Framework for the mutual recognition of International Qualifications.
- International co-operation and development.
- Research and innovation.
- Education, Professional training and youth.
